integration_patterns: Webhook-based notifications for patient data updates

evidence.claim: Corica Group utilizes AWS services for scalable cloud infrastructure.
They support FHIR and HL7 standards for health data exchange.
The platform ensures HIPAA compliance for all healthcare transactions.
Their API documentation mentions specific integration with EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of X12 transactions or a clearinghouse focus.
